title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Lead resilient security teams through psychological safety (SEC219)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过心理安全领导有韧性的安全团队 (SEC219)
abstract: What makes security teams excel? This lightning talk explores four key psychological safety elements that strengthen security operations. Learn practical ways to help your team feel secure being themselves, learning openly, contributing ideas, and challenging the status quo. Walk away with actionable steps to build trust and improve team performance.
abstract_cn: 是什么让安全团队表现卓越?这场闪电演讲探讨了加强安全运营的四个关键心理安全要素。了解帮助团队成员自在做自己、公开学习、贡献想法和挑战现状的实用方法。带走可操作的步骤来建立信任并提升团队绩效。
